framerate.notes: In Super Mario Galaxy it's using Custom FPS Lock set to 30, Super Mario Sunshine is Double buffer and also using Custom FPS Lock set to 30.

resolution.notes: In Super Mario Galaxy it's Fixed 960x720, in Super Mario Sunshine it's Fixed 1920x1080.

framerate.notes: In Super Mario Galaxy it's using Custom FPS Lock set to 30, Super Mario Sunshine is Double buffer and also using Custom FPS Lock set to 30.

resolution.notes: In Super Mario Galaxy it's Fixed 960x720, in Super Mario Sunshine it's Fixed 1280x720.
